patthana1.13:173.1_2: Sekkhā gotrabhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.

patthana1.13:236.1_1: anulomaṁ gotrabhussa, anulomaṁ vodānassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:237.1_0: Paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṁ tasseva āsevanapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.13:238.1_0: Paritto dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana1.13:239.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā mahaggatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ mahaggatānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.13:240.1_0: Paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.13:240.1_1: **Sahajātā**—parittā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:240.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe parittā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:240.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—parittā cetanā vipākānaṁ parittānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:241.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.13:241.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.13:247.1_0: Paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko paritto eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…

patthana1.13:250.1_13: **Pacchājātā**—parittā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.13:255.1_0: Paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.13:255.1_1: **Sahajāto**—paritto eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.13:255.1_10: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.13:255.1_16: **Pacchājātā**—parittā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:256.1_0: Paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.13:256.1_2: **Purejātaṁ**—dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, vatthu mahaggatānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:257.1_0: Paritto dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:258.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:259.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo parittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.13:259.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:259.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—mahaggatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:260.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo parittassa ca mahaggatassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—mahaggato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.13:261.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—appamāṇo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.13:262.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.13:262.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—appamāṇā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:263.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa ca appamāṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— appamāṇo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.13:264.1_0: Paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā parittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.13:264.1_1: **Sahajātā**—appamāṇā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:264.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—appamāṇā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:264.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—appamāṇā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:265.1_0: Paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā appamāṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.13:265.1_1: **Sahajāto**—appamāṇo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…

patthana1.13:268.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte ekādasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane cattāri, kamme satta, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate terasa.

patthana1.13:271.1_0: Paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.13:272.1_0: Paritto dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.13:274.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo parittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …

patthana1.13:278.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.13:279.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:280.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa ca appamāṇassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:281.1_0: Paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā parittassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.13:282.1_0: Paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā appamāṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.13:283.1_0: Paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā parittassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.13:284.1_0: Paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā mahaggatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.13:285.1_0: Nahetuyā pannarasa, naārammaṇe pannarasa, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare pannarasa, nasahajāte dvādasa, naaññamaññe dvādasa, nanissaye dvādasa, naupanissaye cuddasa, napurejāte cuddasa, napacchājāte pannarasa, naāsevane pannarasa …pe…
patthana1.13:285.1_1: namagge pannarasa, nasampayutte dvādasa, navippayutte dasa, noatthiyā dasa, nonatthiyā pannarasa, novigate pannarasa, noavigate dasa.
patthana1.13:287.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta …pe…
patthana1.13:287.1_1: namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.13:289.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte ekādasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane cattāri, kamme satta …pe…
patthana1.13:289.1_1: magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate terasa.
